item.title: Contact
item.description: You can contact me via mail. item.title: Blog init
item.description: You are reading the first post of my blog. It is still in experimental stage. Let’s see where this is heading!

item.title: About
item.description: This is a personal blog. It is built with Hugo using Cactus Theme, I replaced the cactus image and favicon with my bonsai tree. You can find me on Github
